job_details.degree_required: Bachelor's in computer science related fields

jd: From: Prakash Singh, RCI prakash@rconsultinginc.com Reply to: prakash@rconsultinginc.com Please mentioned Location as per DL and visa status while sharing the resume Position: Sr. Pega Engineer/DeveloperVisa: No H1b/OPT/CPTLocation: Onsite 3 days a week: Austin, TX (clients 1st choice), Memphis, TN, Morris Plains, NJ or St Louis, MO – no other offices currentlyDuration: 12+ months Candidate must have the 5+ years of Pega Healthcare Management Suite and the 7 years of Java. PLEASE, NO candidates that do not meet these minimum requirements for this one.MUST HAVES:·5 + year of experience with Pega BPM 8.8.X including Pega Healthcare Management suite·7+ years of Java development experience·5+ years of experience working in a Test-Driven Development (TDD) Environment performing code reviews, design reviews, peer reviews Duties:·Analyse, design and support implementation of business specific Pega solutions and/or frameworks·Responsible for implementing technical solutions on Pega 8.8.X, and Pega Healthcare Management Suite·Ability to create reusable components that can be leveraged across the enterprise for providing top-notch customer experience·Ability to translate complex business requirement into functional technical requirements using Pega Systems BPM methodology·Good hands on implementing PEGA integration services, good understanding of PEGA new case management features.·Perform regular code and design reviews.·Assist with planning and execution of unit, integration and user acceptance testing·Provide regular updates to product owners and management on project progress and outstanding issues·Takes responsibility for resolving escalations and reporting back to operations leadership as needed·Participates in peer-reviews of solution designs and related code and configurations.·Supports packaging and deployment of releases·Analyses and resolves technical and application problems and monitors the performance of internal systems·Attends scrum ceremony meetings and design sessions.·Maximize the efficiency (operational, performance, and cost) of the application assets.Required Skills: PEGA, JAVASkills: PEGA , JAVA , Splunk or any similar log analyzer , Dynatrace or any similar monitoring tool , SQL
